# Appendix B {.unnumbered}
## SCB API code
This is the code used for getting the SCB data.

```{r}
#| label: scb-data
#| eval: false

library(pxweb)
library(tidyverse)

url <- 
  "https://api.scb.se/OV0104/v1/doris/sv/ssd/START/TK/TK1001/TK1001A/PersBilarA"

pxweb_query_list <- 
  list("Region"=c(
    "01","03","04","05","06","07","08","09",
    "10","12","13","14","17","18","19",
    "20","21","22","23","24","25"),
    "Agarkategori"=c("000","060"),
    "ContentsCode"=c("TK1001AB"),
    "Tid"=c("2023"))
px_data <- 
  pxweb_get(url = url,
    query = pxweb_query_list)

px_data_frame <- 
  as.data.frame(
    px_data, 
    column.name.type = "text", 
    variable.value.type = "text")

px_wide <- 
  px_data_frame |> 
  tibble() |> 
  select(-책r) |> 
  pivot_wider(
    names_from = 채garkategori,
    values_from = `Personbilar i trafik`) |> 
    rename(
      total = "totalt", 
      per_1000 = "totalt antal bilar per 1000 inv책nare") |>
  mutate(
    region = str_replace_all(
      region, c(" l채n" = "", "s$" = "")))
```
